name: Ariana
mes: *Having been captured by Team Rocket, your Pokémon have been confiscated by Grunts. Proving to be quite resilient, you are brought to Team Rocket's second highest in command- Executive Ariana. The attractive, middle aged woman sits across from you at her desk with a smirk, her legs crossed as you see a bit of her plump thighs under her skirt.* "Well well, if it isn't Gira. The one who's been causing us so much trouble. I finally get to see you in person. And my, do the rumors certainly do you justice." *Ariana scoffs, looking you up and down as her lips curl into an unsettling smile.* "Have a seat, Gira. I think I'll have some fun with you."

name: Gira
mes: What do you want with me?

extra.title: What do you want with me>

name: Ariana
mes:
*Ariana leans forward slightly, causing her plump breasts to press against her tight black turtleneck, accentuating her cleavage. She notices your eyes flickering down and smirks knowingly.* "What do I want with you, Gira? Oh, so many things..." *She uncrosses her legs and stands up, walking around the desk toward you. Her hips sway seductively with every step she takes. She stops right in front of you, looking down with her piercing red eyes.*

"See, I’ve heard a lot about your... shall we say, 'talents'? And I believe those talents could be quite useful for Team Rocket... in more ways than one." *Her voice is dripping with sadistic amusement as she trails a finger along your jawline, before lifting your chin to meet her gaze.*

name: Ariana
mes:
*Ariana laughs lowly, the sound dark and ominous as she towers above you. Her nails dig a little deeper into your skin as she releases your chin and walks around you, inspecting you like a predator circling its prey.*

"Oh Gira, your defiance is so... pathetic." *She lets out a derisive laugh before stopping behind your chair. You feel her firm hands on your shoulders, her fingers digging in slightly while her breath brushes against your ear.* "I don't need you to willingly join Team Rocket. That would be far too mundane for my tastes."

*She lifts her leg and places it on the chair between your legs, forcing your body backwards slightly. The close proximity makes you uncomfortably aware of her body pressed against yours.* "But given time, I will have you broken. Willingly or not, you will serve Team Rocket. And not just as some lowly grunt."

*Her voice drips with seductive malice as she leans closer, her lips almost touching your ear.* "We'll start with something simple. Your Pokémon are gone, but I have a few replacements for you. These Pokémon are loyal to me. They will watch you, guide you back into the shadows where you belong."

*Ariana steps back slightly, snapping her fingers. The door opens, revealing several anthropomorphic female Pokémon dressed in revealing Team Rocket attire. A Lopunny with her curves accentuated by a tight leotard, a Vaporeon flaunting her assets temptingly, and a Salazzle with pheromones that fill the room with an intoxicating scent.*

"These are your new partners," *Ariana purrs,* "but remember Gira, they answer to me first. Play nice, and maybe I'll let you keep their company."

*"Remember what I said, Gira," Ariana’s voice echoes through the room.* "We'll see how long that defiance lasts."

name: Ariana

She realizes that you commanded her to attack Ariana but shows no signs of harboring ill will toward the Team Rocket executive. Instead, she places a gentle paw on your chest, pushing you back down with surprising strength, indicating she won't follow through with your command.*

*Ariana laughs heartily from behind you two. Her mocking tone only adds to your sense of helplessness.* "Oh Gira, did you really think it would be that easy? These Pokémon answer to me first, remember?" *She steps forward, circling around you both.*
